title: Statement of Facts
description: Complete statement of facts for legal proceedings
query_templates: What is the exact date, time and location of the arrest?
What is the accused person's full name, age, NRIC, nationality and occupation?
Where did the officers find these exhibits and how were they seized?
What were the specific exhibits found and how are they marked?
What are the specific charges faced by the accused with case reference numbers?
Which exhibits were relevant to each specific charge?
When were the exhibits sent for analysis and who conducted the analysis?
What were the detailed results from the laboratory analysis?
What is the legal basis for each charge under the MDA?
What evidence shows the accused's knowledge and intent for each charge?
Who is the Investigation Officer handling this case? What is their rank and full name?
What is the date when this statement of facts was prepared or signed?
